title: Finding an answer to Arsenal's midfield dilemma will determine both the success and length of Unai Emery's reign
text:
Over the last 180 minutes of football, Arsenal have used five different players as central playmakers and not one of them has been Mesut Ozil. That fact alone goes some way towards illustrating their struggles in the past two matches, as well as explaining the simmering disgruntlement from a growing section of their supporters towards Unai Emery.

The Ozil diehards, if we are to call them that, have been vocal for a while now. The crowing about his omission has mostly been on social media, though, where the German is lionised by some of his most devout supporters as one of the greatest footballers to ever walk the earth. For them, the sight of Joe Willock, Dani Ceballos, Bukayo Saka, Lucas Torreira...
description: Over the last 180 minutes of football, Arsenal have used five different players as central playmakers and not one of them has been Mesut Ozil.
